analysis.key_quote: This proposed regulation seeks to reclassify certain federal positions into a new category, reminiscent of the previously rescinded “Schedule F,” which would strip career civil servants of essential job protections.
analysis.rationale: The comment clearly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based principles, due process rights, and the risk of politicization in the civil service, indicating a strong stance against the implementation of the regulation.
